: : Hollywood : :

A thick, long, red and yellow boa constrictor is slither=
ing through the woods.  A couple seconds pass by, and the boa transforms in=
to a bot.

Hollywood:  I'm starting to hate these colours.  Red and yellow =
just isn't....me anymore!

The bot, who was clad in red and yellow plating,=
 stopped and sat by a tree.  He checked his transmissions, and recieved an =
encoded one!

Hollywood:  Why, I bet I could figure this out!

After a coup=
le minutes, Hollywood had figured out the message!  He thought about this "=
new order" and got a sinister grin on his face.  He transformed into a car(=
think Hot Rod style, only red and yellow) and with a rev of the engine, sta=
rted driving towards Razor's base...
